ch.usi.inf.lidr.selection
Interface ResourceSelection

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractResourceSelection, CiSS, CiSSApprox, CRCSExp, CRCSLinear, GAVGLog, ReDDE, ReDDETop, SUSHI
public interface ResourceSelection

An interface for small-document (SD) approaches to resource selection. These techniques select and rank resources based on the ranking of documents in a centralized sample index (CSI).

Author:
Ilya Markov
See Also:
"Relevant document distribution estimation method for resource selection", Luo Si and Jamie Callan. In Proceedings of SIGIR, pages 298-305, 2003.

Method Summary
<T> List<ScoredEntity<Resource>>
select(List<ScoredEntity<T>> documents, List<Resource> resources)
          Given a list of scored documents and a list of corresponding resources, calculates a score for each resource and ranks resources by their scores.
 

Method Detail

select

<T> List<ScoredEntity<Resource>> select(List<ScoredEntity<T>> documents,
                                        List<Resource> resources)
Given a list of scored documents and a list of corresponding resources, calculates a score for each resource and ranks resources by their scores. Returns an ordered list of scored resources. Resources are ordered descending with respect to their scores.

Each resource in the resources list should correspond to a document in the documents list, i.e. resources.get(i) is a resource of documents.get(i). Therefore, the lists should be of the same length.

Documents should not be necessarily sorted by their scores.

Parameters:
documents - The list of scored documents.
resources - The list of corresponding resources.
Returns:
A descending ordered list of scored resources.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if documents or resources is null.
IllegalArgumentException - if documents and resources are of different size.
